label: Postal and Packaging Supplies
description: Supplies for mailing and packaging items, including boxes, envelopes, and shipping materials.

subcategories.label: Shipping Boxes
subcategories.description: Boxes for shipping items of various sizes and shapes.

subcategories.label: Envelopes
subcategories.description: Envelopes for mailing letters and documents.

subcategories.label: Shipping Materials
subcategories.description: Materials for packing and shipping items, including tape, bubble wrap, and packing peanuts.

subcategories.label: Postal Scales
subcategories.description: Scales for weighing packages and letters to determine postage.

subcategories.label: Shipping Labels
subcategories.description: Labels for identifying and tracking packages during shipping.
